name: Zombie Toys
description:
This game was created as part of the official Unity Certification program, specifically the Unity Certified Associate: Game Developer courseware.

The player controls either a boy or girl doll toy in an "oversized" bedroom scene. The player is attacked by zombie bears, bunnies, ducks, clowns, and Hellephants (lol). Player has 4 attacks to switch between (lightning, ice, slime and stink bomb). Player can spawn a sheep ally to distract the enemies.

Skills learned in the creation of this project: Importing assets (3d models, audio files, images etc.), lighting the scene, baking lighting (lightmaps, NavMesh Agents, NavMesh obstacles etc.), animations, particles systems/VFX, audio mixers & audio effects/SFX, UI, camera control, and much more! 

I highly recommend this course to anyone thinking about getting this Certification; I learned a ton from this courseware!
